htsjdk.samtools.cram.io

Class ITF8

  • java.lang.Object
    • htsjdk.samtools.cram.io.ITF8

  • public class ITF8
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods to read and write int values as per ITF8 specification in CRAM.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ITF8() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int readUnsignedITF8(byte[] data)
      Reads an unsigned (32 bit) integer from an array of bytes.

      Reads an unsigned (32 bit) integer from a ByteBuffer.

      Reads an unsigned (32 bit) integer from an InputStream.
      static byte[] writeUnsignedITF8(int value)
      Writes an unsigned (32 bit) integer to a byte new array encoded as ITF8.
      static void writeUnsignedITF8(int value, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Writes an unsigned (32 bit) integer to an OutputStream encoded as ITF8.
      static int writeUnsignedITF8(int value, java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
      Writes an unsigned (32 bit) integer to an OutputStream encoded as ITF8.

    • Method Detail

      • readUnsignedITF8

        public static int readUnsignedITF8(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an unsigned (32 bit) integer from an InputStream. The sign bit should be interpreted as a value bit.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the stream to read from
        Returns:
        the value read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - as per java IO contract

      • writeUnsignedITF8

        public static int writeUnsignedITF8(int value,
                                    java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Writes an unsigned (32 bit) integer to an OutputStream encoded as ITF8. The sign bit is interpreted as a value bit.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be written out
        outputStream - the stream to write to
        Returns:
        number of bits written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - as per java IO contract

      • readUnsignedITF8

        public static int readUnsignedITF8(byte[] data)
        Reads an unsigned (32 bit) integer from an array of bytes. The sign bit should be interpreted as a value bit.
        Parameters:
        data - the bytes to read from
        Returns:
        the value read

      • writeUnsignedITF8

        public static byte[] writeUnsignedITF8(int value)
        Writes an unsigned (32 bit) integer to a byte new array encoded as ITF8. The sign bit is interpreted as a value bit.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be written out
        Returns:
        the bytes holding ITF8 representation of the value

      • readUnsignedITF8

        public static int readUnsignedITF8(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Reads an unsigned (32 bit) integer from a ByteBuffer. The sign bit should be interpreted as a value bit.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the bytes to read from
        Returns:
        unsigned integer value from the buffer

      • writeUnsignedITF8

        public static void writeUnsignedITF8(int value,
                                     java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Writes an unsigned (32 bit) integer to an OutputStream encoded as ITF8. The sign bit is interpreted as a value bit.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be written out
        buffer - the ByteBuffer to write to
